强推！现在CSGO热度很高但是不少后入坑的人应该不知道没玩过CSS、CSCZ吧。当初是我的童年回忆，现在补票来的。游戏代入感很强，真的像成为了反恐精英一样做任务，由于是04年的游戏，画质不能要求太高，这种画质反而给我童年的美好的感觉。建议没玩过的入手体验一下

Я был приятно удивлён встретить в сети живые серваки CS:CZ! Услада для глаз прямо была, пока реализовывал детскую мечту, аж смаковал каждое мгновение!
Очень жаль, что не выстрелила эта версия и не набрала должной популярности в РФ, слишком большая конкуренция со стороны 1.6 и CS:S не оставила шансов на успех!

Are you lonely on a weekend and have no plans? Do you wish Counter-Strike had a single player campaign? Well fret not! Counter-Strike: Condition Zero surely does hit the mark of single player content in a Counter-Strike game, but that's about it. The single player content is kind of like Mission Mode in Mario Kart DS or Spec Ops in the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare series. This games name also match the amount of active players, 0. There is literally no reason to get this game nowadays when CS:GO has more to offer and CS:Source is just better. But, if you're an avid Counter-Strike fan and want to collect all the games, I'd say wait for it to go on sale. Damn near every Summer and Winter you can pick up this game for a dollar. Not to mention the development process behind this and CS:CZ Deleted scenes makes this an interesting piece of Valve history.

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero is a first-person shooter game published by VAlve.  It is an improved version of the original Counter-Strike, which was a mod for the game Half-Life.  Initially focused on the single-player "story" mode, however, it was cut from the main version of the game and was later released under the name "Deleted Scenes"

Condition Zero es básicamente una nueva versión del clásico Counter Strike 1.6, que incluye un retoque grafico (armas, modelos de personaje y mapas) que puede gustarte más o menos. Pero lo que lo hace diferenciarse y razón por la cual es de mi agrado es que incluye un Modo Campaña y el Modo Tour of Duty.

En el primero se debe iniciar el juego "CS:CZ Deleted Scenes", y como dije es básicamente una campaña compuesta por una serie de misiones cual Call of Duty promedio pero con la jugabilidad de Counter Strike, es un poco tosco, hay que admitirlo, pero está entretenido.

El segundo viene en el juego base y es otra forma de encarar partidas contra bots, en este obligatoriamente jugaremos de Antiterrorista y conforme avancemos conseguiremos puntos, con estos puntos podremos reclutar compañeros con mejores estadísticas y armas, es un poco extraño, pero se agradece que se implemente algo nuevo.

No supera al clásico, pero está pasable.

5.5/10

People complain about CS S being the worst in the series, cause they don't want to admit Condition Zero is truly the black sheep of Counter Strike.

First of all, there are no differences between 1.6 and CZ (if there is any). Graphically is the same. Same weapons. Same HUD but with different color. The only good improvement I noticed was adding the Spetsnaz and Midwest Militia. 

But the worst thing is that still uses GoldSrc... in 2004... That same year Half Life 2 and CS S arrived with the new Source engine, which is fresh even 20 years later with ragdoll mechanics, better graphics, etc. I understand Valve and TurtleRock Studios had issues doing the game, but looks like a joke that in the same year we got a game made with the Half Life engine and its sucesor.

I said there were barely some changes, right? Well, we've got some kind of "operations", which are basically levels trying to stop terrorists with bots. So almost nothing that makes this game superior than 1.6, Source or Global Offensive. 

And for last, game includes Deleted Scenes, which is the only thing worth playing from this. Originally this game was suposed to include campaign, and I must admit Valve and TurtleRock made their best with that. Might not be the glory, but it's was more amusing than base game.

Bu oyun aklımda her zaman çok iyi bir oyun olarak kaldı. Gerek yapay zekası, gerek oyunun kendi içine yerleştirmiş olduğu rekabetçi modu olsun her şeyiyle benim için özel bir oyun oldu. Ama bunun tamamen bir nostalji yanılsaması olduğunu fark etmem uzun sürmedi. Bu oyunun dinamikleri tam anlamıyla ÇÖP. Adamın kafasına nişan alıp ateş ediyorsunuz ölmüyor. Bedenine ateş ediyorsunuz yine ölmüyor. Kafa dinamiği rezalet olduğu gibi, beden dinamikleri de çok kötü. Kendi içindeki rekabetçi modunu tek başına oynamadığınız zaman zevki asla çıkmıyor, ben de o yüzden tek başıma oynayayım dedim ama dayanamadım. Çünkü dinamikleri çalışmıyor kodumunun oyununun. O zaman daha ne kaldı ki geriye zaten? Dinamikleri olmayan bir shooter mı oynayayım? Böyle saçma sapan bir şey olabilir mi abi? Kesinlikle, eğer arkadaşlarınızla gireyim de iki kafa dağıtayım demeyecekseniz (ki bu oyunda neden kafa dağıtasınız o da çok ayrı bir konu) satın almayın, oynamayın. Kafayı yiyorsunuz çünkü bir zaman sonra. Dinamikleri 1.6'dan bile kötü olan bir oyunla ilk defa karşılaşıyorum. Kendinizi beceriksizin önde gideni gibi hissetmek istiyorsanız paraya kıyıp alabilirsiniz. Ben paket halinde almıştım tüm bu oyunları indirimdeyken işte o yüzden içim rahat. Yoksa bu oyuna 18.50 TL verseydim kendimi tokatlardım herhalde.

This game saved my life.

I'm 27.

My ex and I have a girl together, and took on our child together. They are presently both 4 years of age.

At the point when we were going through our detachment, I wound up lost and hopeless. I was reckless. I got so frantic one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some substantial in a snapshot of overpowering feeling. That made me break my fifth metacarpal in my right hand... my functioning hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and conveyed my youngsters to bed with.. The hand I frantically expected to ensure I could keep on giving.

In the wake of learning of the seriousness of my self-caused harm, I was fringe self-destructive. Remember that only a couple of months before this, I was the most joyful man without really any set of experiences of sadness or tension. I have never had angry outbursts, or been one to separate and cry, yet I was in a low spot that very covered me from having the option to see the light on the opposite side.

Having nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play, ONE Gave while I recuperated. I some way or another coincidentally found this game and read a portion of the audits. I concluded that it must merit a shot... I should concede, I didn't beat the game, or play close to as long as some of you. Indeed, I might have just played this game a little while.. So, in the wake of doing as such, I had a freshly discovered satisfaction and expectation forever. I had the option to put behind me the aggravation and experiencing that had been projected over me. I had the option to encounter different people groups euphoria and joy. I had the option to see the my "rewards for so much hard work". I loose for 5 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ minutes to this music adequately long to understand that I would have been OK.

Subsequent to realizing that, I switched the game off, and I returned to work. It hurt my hand like hellfire however I was propelled. I quit feeling so damn upset for myself, and I turned into the dad I should have been at that time, not the feeble kid I was acting as.

Today, I'm dear companion with my children mother. We don't battle, or contend, or direct pernicious sentiments toward one another. We are guardians, and companions.

I presently have 3 children. My third kid is, sit tight for it, Likewise 4 Years of age. The lady I'm with was going through a very much like circumstance at the hour of my own division, and we just staggered in to every others life suddenly. We have been seeing someone per year now, and are extremely content.

Lesson of the story, no one can tell what life holds coming up for you, and in the event that I would have surrendered when all the situation was anything but favorable for me, I wouldn't be the place where I'm today. This senseless minimal game assisted me with understanding that.

Much obliged to you
